item.description:
Rock Spot is celebrating Halloween a little early with a climbing and bouldering event that includes a DJ, black lights, costume contests, and more! There will be tons of new bouldering routes after Saturday mornings competition. If you plan to top rope bring your headlamp, they  may have a few to lend out as well.

The event runs 7:00 pm to midnight, but I plan on getting there between 8:30 and 9:00. 

 

Free for  Rock Spot members!

Non-members: $10 if you have your own gear, $15 includes rentals.

An additional $5 donation to the Rumney Climber’s Association gains you access to the post-climb lounge with refreshments provided by Harpoon (21+, proper ID required).
item.how_to_find_us: Oh, come on. We're so easy to spot. If you have trouble ask at the front desk.
item.name: Rock Spot Black Light Bouldering Bash
